name: 陳信安
objective:
本課程主要在提供學生有關計算機系統之基本知識及應用。授課內容包括：1.電腦的演進  2 .電腦的軟、硬體架構  3. 程式設計基礎
This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers, including, 1. the evolution of the computer, 2. computer software and hardware structure, 3. fundamental of computer programming
